options.name: Ultra Plush
options.description: Most padded; ideal for side sleepers

options.name: Plush
options.description: Ideal for side sleepers

options.name: Medium
options.description: Not too plush or firm; fit for most sleepers

options.name: Firm
options.description: Ideal for stomach sleepers; helps back pain

options.name: Extra Firm
options.description: Least padded; provides maximum support

options.name: Foam & Latex Mattresses
options.description: Constructed entirely of foam for pressure relief

options.name: Innerspring Mattresses
options.description: Constructed with steel coils for support

options.name: Hybrid Mattresses
options.description: A coil base topped with foam layers

options.name: Edge Support
options.description: Reinforced edges prevent sagging

options.name: Heavy Duty
options.description: 1000lb.+ weight capacity

options.name: Mattress Set
options.description: Includes a box spring or adjustable base

options.name: Mattress in a Box
options.description: Ships compressed in a box for ease of delivery

options.name: Cooling Technology
options.description: Regulates temperature during sleep

options.name: Low Motion Transfer
options.description: Eliminates disruption from partner movement

options.name: Flippable
options.description: Both sides of the mattress can be used

options.name: Breathable Construction
options.description: Circulates air for a drier, cleaner sleep

options.name: Tight Top
options.description: Enhances edge support and prevents slide-off

options.name: Pillow Top
options.description: Extra layer of cushioning for cloud-like feel

options.name: Euro Top
options.description: Extra cushioning sewn flush to mattress

options.name: Memory Foam
options.description: Provides pressure relief and body contouring

options.name: Gel Memory Foam
options.description: Body contouring plus cooling benefits

options.name: Latex
options.description: Cooling, hypoallergenic, responsive bounce

options.name: Pocket Coil
options.description: Targeted support absorbs partner movements

options.name: Continuous Coil
options.description: Durable, with excellent support and bounce

options.name: Made Clean
options.description: Less chemicals. Cleaner indoor air.

options.name: GREENGUARD Certified
options.description: Uses fewer chemicals.

options.name: Environmentally Preferred
options.description: Lower environmental impact.

options.name: Local Community Empowerment
options.description: Thinking globally, helping locally.
